website_summaries.verdict: A premium quality portable chest freezer with a number of convenient features.
pros: The controls on this model are easy to see and operate and the LED displays the current temperature, battery voltage, and other settings
The internal LED light comes in handy while the USB charging port is a thoughtful addition
cons: If you prefer a more traditional look, this freezer might be a little too modern for your tastes

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit works as advertised. Very quiet. I have 2 larger units from the same manufacturer with no problems after 6 years of use for travel and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Hard freeze
customer_reviews.text: Freezes sub zero no problem. Just remember to not fast freeze (FF) more than 4 hours or just use auto. There is no auto disengage on the FF function.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is an incredible add for our camping trips. With both AC and DC power, it provides a lot of flexibility. This is NOT a cooler, it's a true fridge/freezer. The only, very slight criticism I have is the temp accuracy. In the deeper bin, it's three degrees off, i.e. showing 34 means it's actually 38. The upper, smaller, bin is about a degree off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: This fridge won't work well with lithium batteries
customer_reviews.text: It's a good fridge with solid build quality. But unfortunately, it won't work well with Lithium batteries because of its "low voltage protection" function that CANNOT BE TURNED OFF. Even at the lowest setting, fridge will shutdown at 10V. But 10V is still half empty for Lithium batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Future scientist

customer_reviews.title: storage
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My frigerator is on the blink so I needed something fast and this came raring to go and freezes very fast with enough capacity to help 2 people's frozen food needs in a dire situation. Fastest delivery ever ( 5 days) in these horrible times and thanks so much Amazon for saving some our food!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Golden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for compact CUV
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect item not only for jeep or off roading but for compact suv too. I got the Mazda CX-5 and it is fit perfectly in the trunk cargo area. However, please notice the shipping carrier cause they won’t place it correctly as the tag said
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: The battery saver works very well. It is switchable so it automatically takes care of voltage source - no unplugging and replugging. I love the light! I didn't realize how much it lights the interior and boy does it help! Maintains the correct temperature and as a bonus, I can see what the battery voltage is. I've had it for a month in constant use and can't find a single negative! Replaced a cooler that was twice as expensive with an inferior latching system.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Starr Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Sits in the back of my Jeep. Powered by a Goal Zero that is connected to 3x15watt solar panels. It gets cold quick and is very quiet. So quiet I kept checking to see if it was working. I use it for drinks and a meal or two. More usable space since it doesn't need ice. Its not going to hold a ton of stuff, what it does hold stays cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kip C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Yeti
customer_reviews.text: One of most amazing coolers I've ever purchased. I would buy this over Yeti any day now that I have experienced them both side by side. I have it running out at a remote farm barn off a 12v battery recharged by solar for two months now, and my beer is always ice cold. In fact I had to turn the thermostat up because I was getting ice inside. Using a battery monitor it draws 1 or 2 amps, while the led light I have off the same battery draws 20 amps. Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: jacktar

customer_reviews.title: Nice refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: We really like this frig for keeping our food cold in the car. It pulled the temp down from room temp (74F) to below freezing (<32F) within an hour or two. The only drawback is that the frig is more tall and than it is wide. Since the weight is not evenly distributed in the frig, it flipped over and fell off the cart when we were taking it to the car. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: norris bolden

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, door doesn’t lock, a bit noisy that can be annoying while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I feel is to overprice , door latch doesn’t even close. You have to put something heavy on top, so it doesn’t pop. Theres no locking system at all to hold it in place. You can run a strap around the whole fridge to keep it closed. You would have to figured out by yourself. Other than that fridge works well so far for my first month using it in my van. Oh!! use the auto mode after you setup the best temperature for your use. Other options can be tricky, read blogs and manual before using it. I read some people mest it up by using the freeze mode for long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto

customer_reviews.title: Fridge/freezer
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid built product. will either cool or freeze not both. Prefrozen packages of meat stayed frozen for 3 days, when the unit was set for 37 deg. the weather was between 60's at night and 80 during the day. Nice size for 2-3 people - will keep drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Tilda

customer_reviews.title: Cool very cool
customer_reviews.text: It functions wonderfully however you cannot disable the battery saver function highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Leon Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Performs like more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unit. Automatically switches to DC if AC is lost. Reaches 15 degrees F fast in 75 degree room. It’s a real freezer if you want it to be. Only criticism is the lid open alarm does not sense if the lid is latched, so it can be not quite closed and you get no warning.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler on 12v or 110volt.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep the drinks cold. No more buying ice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: I use this product daily and is has been very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can set this to cool at a specific temperature and it has no problem cooling to whatever temperature I set and staying very consistent throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: 1 week so far. I have to admit it...I was skeptical. Obviously I can't speak to long term but it froze everything as advertised. It is packed to the top. Running off house bank 2-100 ah batteries. Victron controller says it + the isotherm refrigerator can run 25 hrs. .....3.5 amps
customer_reviews.author: Sean L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pulls down to -8 fast holds at 37* all day in 100* + temps. So far an excellent value. The only minor negative is it's a few pounds heavier that some of the other brands but that could be more insulation or a heavier compressor in the Whynter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really keeps food frozen, not just cool
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy. We needed to order a special cart to transport it from our car to a motel. However, once installed, it works great and you can even store ice cream overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Thurow

product_meta.title: Whynter FMC-350XP 34 Quart Compact Portable Refrigerator, AC 110V/ DC 12V True Freezer for Car, Home, Camping, RV-8°F to 50°F, Gray
product_meta.description: This Whynter Portable Fridge / Freezer offers premium quality and innovative design to your frozen/ refrigerated needs. This freezer is great for RVs, boats, campsites, fishing trips and truly portable so you can take your fridge / freezer anywhere! All you need is either a standard household 110 Volt outlet or a 12 Volt power source, like an automotive battery.
feature_bullets: 34 Quarts or 48 cans (12FL oz) capacity; Adjustable temperature range: -8°F to 50°F; LED temperature display; “Fast Freeze” mode rapidly cools to -8°F
8-feet AC power cord and 10-feet DC power cord; Two removable wire baskets; Insulated lid and walls; ETL approved

Power low indicator; Functions even when tilted 30°; Tough and solid outer plastic housing; Drain Plug for easy cleaning; Stainless steel side handles; Non-slip rubber mat that maintains grip on the surface of the portable freezer to prevent drinks from spilling or sliding; USB port outlet

Car, RV and home use; Operates as a refrigerator or freezer; work with 12/24V DC and 110V AC power; Voltage power AC (115V/ 60Hz – 1.0A A) or DC (12V/24V – 5.2A /2.6A Car Lighter Socket); unit can be plugged in with both AC power and the DC power at the same time. If both AC and DC are plugged in at the same time, then the unit will primarily operate on AC. If the AC power source fails, DC will become primary power supply source.
Wattage: 70 Watts. Net weight: 42 LB. Internal dimensions: 10" W x 20" L x 12" H. 45.5 dBA

specifications.Special Features: Space-Saving Design Consistent Temperature USB Port Outlet LED interior lighting & Door Open Alarm
specifications.Included Components: 8-feet AC power cord and 10-feet DC power cord
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
